attributes.action: Cases of COVID-19 within the school and don’t agree on sending child to school.
attributes.additional_details: The Covid-19 is being passed on at school then onto grandparents within their home
attributes.background: Give parents the option to home school children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Allow temporary homeschooling during the pandemic without losing school place: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551464
